Articles.Content: Hi, no matter what I try, I can't get the SmokeScreen mod to work.  The UI for it never shows up when I'm launching rockets.  I've tried launching multiple versions of KSP, multiple versions of SmokeScreen, installing with CKAN, installing manually, completely fresh installing KSP, installing SmokeScreen by itself and installing it with other dependent mods.  I can't figure this out, anyone ever experienced this or have any ideas?

Found the answer to this issue.  You need to install the Toolbars mod as well in order to gain access to the UI for SmokeScreen.  This dependency isn't mentioned at all anywhere and I just happened to see a random comment somewhere mentioning the Toolbars mod. Hope this helps someone in the future.

Toolbar or ToolbarController?

12 hours ago, linuxgurugamer said:

Toolbar or ToolbarController?

Toolbar
